body: This hentai fanfiction is the most disgusting and unhealthy of the series, she's full of testosterone :/, but no way to get an erection... The character of Inori is clearly calumniate and distorted ! Moreover it's not different from a pedophile rape when you know the context of Inori who saw the adult day. But Gay/Gai says himself that Mana and Inori both chose Shu and not him. Inori is grateful but not in love with Gai and she didn't totally lie to Shu... I'm going to forget what I saw, it's better for my mental health!
